installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y curl tar ca-certificates

cd /mnt/server

rm -rf var tailscale.tgz tailscale_*

ARCH=$(uname -m)
case "${ARCH}" in
    x86_64) ARCH="amd64" ;;
    aarch64) ARCH="arm64" ;;
    armv7l) ARCH="arm" ;;
    *) exit 1 ;;
esac

VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/tailscale/tailscale/releases/latest | grep '"tag_name":' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/' | sed 's/v//')

if [ -z "$VERSION" ]; then
    echo "Error getting version, falling back to 1.94.1"
    VERSION="1.94.1"
fi

curl -L "https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/tailscale_${VERSION}_${ARCH}.tgz" -o tailscale.tgz
tar xzf tailscale.tgz --strip-components=1

rm tailscale.tgz
rm -rf systemd

chmod +x tailscaled tailscale
